title: Simulation/VR-Based Extreme Apprenticeship Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course for pre-service and in-service elementary school teachers to strengthen math education competencies

learning_goals: Learners design math problem-solving models at least three times by recreating real classroom scenarios in VR simulation environments
Learners execute feedback loops using extreme apprenticeship methods at least five times through collaborative learning with peer teachers
Learners produce and submit completed math lesson scenarios as digital portfolios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
